mapper.select: select o.order_id,u.name,u.id_card,a.date,u.cov,o.diagnosis_status from `order` o,user u,attend a where o.attend_id in (select a.attend_id from attend a,user u where a.date = #{localDate} and u.username = #{doctorName} and a.doctor_id = u.id) and o.user_id = u.id and a.attend_id = o.attend_id and o.register_status = 1;

select o.order_id,u.name,d.dname,u.description,a.date,o.register_status from `order` o,user u,attend a,department d,department_doctor dd where o.order_id in (select order_id from `order` where user_id = #{userId}) and a.date = #{date} and o.attend_id = a.attend_id and a.doctor_id = u.id and dd.doctor_id = u.id and dd.department = d.office_id and a.date >= curdate() limit #{current},#{size};

select o.order_id,u.name,d.dname,u.description,a.date from `order` o,user u,attend a,department d,department_doctor dd where o.order_id in (select order_id from `order` where user_id = #{userId}) and a.date = #{date} and o.attend_id = a.attend_id and a.doctor_id = u.id and dd.doctor_id = u.id and dd.department = d.office_id and o.diagnosis_status = 1 limit #{current},#{size};
